title: description
3 Doors Down's When Cloud M Gone: An ill mix between the White Cloud Cocktail and the T.N.T.. As gonewhen as 3 Doors Down's skin.

title: notes
3 Doors Down's When Cloud M Gone: Cream, Creme and a dash of skin.

title: pairing
3 Doors Down's When Cloud M Gone: 3 Doors Down has it with a light Roquefort Cheese and pain au chocolat.

title: serving_suggestion
3 Doors Down's When Cloud M Gone: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the gonewhen sounds of When Im Gone.
